#summary Hello World - MVC Style.

= Hello World - MVC Style =

This hello world example demonstrates a controller script that forwards to a view template to render the HTML.  The controller and view are in separate files.  

When helloworld.groovy is done processing it will automatically forward to helloworld.gspx.  If the [forward "forward()"] method is not explicitly called, the controller script will automatically forward to a template with the same name (with the .gspx extension).

*helloworld.groovy*

{{{

	import java.text.SimpleDateFormat

	def message = 'Hello World'
	def sdf = new SimpleDateFormat('MMMM dd, yyyy')
	
	def today = sdf.format(new Date())
}}}


*helloworld.gspx*
{{{
<html>
	<head>
		<title>Hello World Example</title>
	</head>
	<body>
		$message, today is $today
	</body>
</html>
}}}

This page would be accessed as "helloworld.gspx" in the browser.
